mainDishes._comment: Main dishes are included FREE with every combo. These are the base foods.
mainDishes._howToAdd: Copy an existing item, change the id/name/description/image, set available to true
mainDishes._howToRemove: Set 'available' to false to hide from menu (keeps order history intact)

deliveryZones._comment: Delivery zones with fees and estimated delivery times
deliveryZones._coordinates: Optional GPS coordinates for map features [latitude, longitude]
deliveryZones._howToUpdate: Change fee or estimatedTime as needed. Add new zones by copying existing format.

promoCodes._types: percentage = % off, fixed = specific amount off in UGX
promoCodes._minOrder: Optional minimum order amount required (in UGX)
promoCodes._howToAdd: Add new code: 'CODE_NAME': { discount: amount, type: 'percentage' or 'fixed', minOrder: amount }

SAVE8._description: 8% off on orders above 80,000 UGX - Deal of the Week

TEST28._description: TEST ONLY - 28% off any order, no minimum

featuredItems._comment: Items to display on the home page 'Popular Dishes' section
featuredItems._note: Use IDs that exist in the menu above. Order matters - first is shown first.

_QUICK_TIPS.toAddItem: Copy existing item, change id/name/description/image/price, set available=true
_QUICK_TIPS.toRemoveItem: Set available=false (keeps item in order history)
_QUICK_TIPS.toUpdatePrice: Just change the 'price' or size 'price' field
_QUICK_TIPS.toReorderItems: Cut and paste items in different order
